trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract class for supporting formatting services to a line of text.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> class.
<c>pixelsPerDip</c> should be set to the TextSource's PixelsPerDip value.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> class.
This constructor must be called for every class that is inherited from <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine>.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor deve ser chamado para cada classe que é herdada do <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the top to the baseline of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> object.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the baseline distance.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Double" /> que representa a distância da linha de base.

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCollapsingProperties" /> objects that represent the collapsed text properties.
Create a collapsed line based on collapsed text properties.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> value that represents a collapsed line that can be displayed.
Gets the number of characters following the last character of the line that may trigger reformatting of the current line.
An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the number of characters.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> valor que representa o número de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: Releases all managed and unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter" /> object.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> object onto which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> is rendered.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> value that represents the drawing origin.
An enumerated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.InvertAxes" /> value that indicates the inversion of the horizontal and vertical axes of the drawing surface.
Renders the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> object based upon the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" />.
Gets the distance from the top-most to bottom-most black pixel in a line.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the extent distance.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Double" /> que representa a distância de extensão.

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> object.
Gets the previous character hit after backspacing.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> object after backspacing.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value that represents the distance from the beginning of the line.
Gets the character hit corresponding to the specified distance from the beginning of the line.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> object at the specified <paramref name="distance" /> from the beginning of the line.
The text flow direction determines how the distance is measured.
trans-unit.target: A direção do fluxo de texto determina como a distância é medida.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> object whose distance you want to query.
Gets the distance from the beginning of the line to the specified character hit.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the distance from the beginning of the line.
The text flow direction determines how the distance is measured.
trans-unit.target: A direção do fluxo de texto determina como a distância é medida.

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for enumerating <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" />.
An enumerator that allows you to enumerate each <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun" /> object in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" />.
By enumerating through the list of <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun> objects, the text layout client can obtain glyph information for each text source character.
trans-unit.target: Enumerando a lista de <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun> objetos, o cliente de layout de texto pode obter informações de glifo para cada caractere de fonte do texto.

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> object.
Gets the next character hit for caret navigation.
The next <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> object based on caret navigation.
The current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> object.
Gets the previous character hit for caret navigation.
The previous <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> object based on caret navigation.
An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the index of first character of specified range.
An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the number of characters of the specified range.
Gets an array of bounding rectangles that represent the range of characters within a text line.
A list of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextBounds" /> objects representing the bounding rectangle.
Gets a collection of collapsed text ranges after a line has been collapsed.
A list of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCollapsedRange" /> objects that represent the collapsed text.
Gets the state of the line when broken by line breaking process.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLineBreak" /> value that represents the line break.
The return value is `null` when the line ends at the end of the paragraph.
trans-unit.target: O valor de retorno é `null` termina a linha no final do parágrafo.

trans-unit.source: The text formatter client may pass the return value back as a parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter.FormatLine%2A> method, which allows the value to be used when formatting the next line within the same paragraph.
trans-unit.target: O cliente de formatador de texto pode passar o valor de retorno como um parâmetro para o <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter.FormatLine%2A> método, que permite que o valor a ser usado ao formatar a próxima linha dentro do mesmo parágrafo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun" /> objects in a text span that are contained within a line.
Gets a list of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun" /> objects contained within a text span.
Gets a value that indicates whether the line is collapsed.
<see langword="true" />, if the line is collapsed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, se a linha estiver recolhida; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether content of the line overflows the specified paragraph width.
<see langword="true" />, it the line overflows the specified paragraph width; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, ele a linha excede a largura do parágrafo especificado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of a line of text.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the text line height.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Double" /> que representa a altura da linha de texto.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the text line is truncated in the middle of a word.
<see langword="true" /> if the text line is truncated in the middle of a word; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a linha de texto será truncada no meio de uma palavra; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.IsTruncated%2A> property value is set only when the <xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping> property of <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties> is set to <xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping.Wrap>, and a single word is wider than the formatting paragraph width.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.IsTruncated%2A> valor da propriedade é definido apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping> propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties> é definido como <xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping.Wrap>, e uma única palavra é maior do que a largura formatação de parágrafo.

trans-unit.source: In such situation, <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> truncates the line in the middle of the word to honor the desired behavior specified by <xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping.Wrap> setting.
trans-unit.target: Em tal situação, <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> trunca a linha no meio da palavra cumprir o comportamento desejado especificado por <xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping.Wrap> configuração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource" /> positions of the current line.
An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the total number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource" /> positions of the current line.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> valor que representa o número total de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource" /> posições da linha atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the edge of the line's highest point to the baseline marker of the line.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the baseline distance of the marker.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Double" /> que representa a distância da linha de base do marcador.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of a marker for a list item.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the height of the marker.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Double" /> que representa a altura do marcador.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of newline characters at the end of a line.
An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the number of newline characters.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> valor que representa o número de caracteres de nova linha.

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance that black pixels extend beyond the bottom alignment edge of a line.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the overhang after distance.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Double" /> que representa a projeção depois de distância.

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance that black pixels extend prior to the left leading alignment edge of the line.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the overhang leading distance.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Double" /> que representa a projeção à esquerda de distância.

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance that black pixels extend following the right trailing alignment edge of the line.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the overhang trailing distance.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Double" /> que representa a projeção à direita de distância.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the PixelsPerDip at which the text should be rendered.
The current <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.PixelsPerDip" /> value.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.PixelsPerDip" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the start of a paragraph to the starting point of a line.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value that represents the distance from the start of a paragraph to the starting point of a line.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Double" /> valor que representa a distância do início de um parágrafo até o ponto de partida de uma linha.

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the top to the baseline of the line of text.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value that represents the text baseline distance.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Double" /> valor que representa a distância da linha de base de texto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the text and any other content in the line.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Double" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.TextHeight%2A> may differ from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.Height%2A> property if the client specified the line height.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.TextHeight%2A> podem diferir de <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.Height%2A> propriedade se o cliente especificou a altura da linha.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of whitespace code points beyond the last non-blank character in a line.
An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the number of whitespace code points beyond the last non-blank character in a line.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> valor que representa o número de pontos de código de espaço em branco além do último caractere não estão em branco em uma linha.

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of a line of text, excluding trailing whitespace characters.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the text line width, excluding trailing whitespace characters.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Double" /> que representa a largura da linha de texto, exceto caracteres de espaço em branco à direita.

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of a line of text, including trailing whitespace characters.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the text line width, including trailing whitespace characters.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Double" /> que representa a largura da linha de texto, incluindo caracteres de espaço em branco à direita.
